thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 32 of 2268
thread.title: Mrs R Robbins
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs R Robbins

author: Mrs R Robbins
title: Mrs R Robbins
text: I am very pleased with all the blinds l have purchased. The quality & colours were exactly as l hoped, the finish looks beautiful on the windows. I am looking to purchase more to re-do my window blinds in the conservatory. Very happy with this company & would recommend, the blinds look very expensive, but very reasonably priced. They arrived earlier than the expected time which was a bonus. My friend put them up & remarked how easy they were to assemble!! Well done Blinds to go, l will return to your site to order more soon.
